nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">food</a>, <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fbergan-turbo-scratcher-cat-toy%2Fdp%2F49192%3F%26utm_source%3DadMarketplace%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3DGeneric%26utm_term%3Dchewy%2Bgeneric%26utm_content%3De1588167367010200000\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">toys</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Max-Marlow-Tall-Scratch-Post/dp/B00X9GVJHK/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=cat+scratching+post&qid=1582309304&refinements=p_72%253A2661618011&rnid=2661617011&s=pet-supplies&sr=1-72&linkCode=ll1&tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&linkId=d4166ce2ed8a17b0c5a47eb8f4b9fddd&language=en_US0c5a47eb8f4b9fddd&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">scratchers</a> to make them feel safe, encourage healthy habits, and provide them with stimulation.</strong></li><li><strong>We consulted with two cat rescue organizations and veterinarian Andrea Moore, owner and medical director at Pinnacle Animal Hospital in California, to determine the most important items to have when bringing a new cat home.</strong></li></ul><p>The day you bring home your new cat is full of joy. But while you may be ready for snuggles and play from the moment your kitty arrives, most felines aren't so gung-ho about moving day. Just when they were beginning to get used to the shelter or foster home — bam — here comes another transition. And cats, they aren't the best at dealing with change.</p><p>Preparing for the arrival of your new cat ahead of time helps to assure that their adjustment will be as seamless as possible. While it's a no-brainer that cats require a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-litter-box\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">litter box</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-food\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">food</a>, new cat owners may not realize that items like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-scratching-post\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">scratching posts</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-tree\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">cat trees</a>, calming pheromones, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-interactive-cat-toys\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">toys</a> can help reduce stress and provide your new pet with an enriching environment.</p><p>With the help of four experts, we've come up with a list of essential things to have when you bring a new cat home. For a veterinary perspective, we consulted with veterinarian Dr. Andrea Moore, owner and medical director at <a href=\"https://pinnaclevets.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Pinnacle Animal Hospital</a> in San Jose, California. Staff at two cat rescue organizations also lent their expertise on how to transition a cat to a new home: Danielle Carr, shelter manager at Town Cats in Morgan Hill, California, and Libby Farel-Friedman and Lindsay Franušić, supervisor and assistant manager of adoption programs, respectively, at the <a href=\"https://www.hssv.org/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Humane Society of Silicon Valley</a> (HSSV) in Milpitas, California.</p><h3>Here are 19 pet supplies to have on hand when you bring your new cat home:</h3>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tA cozy carrier for your kitty's freedom ride and beyond\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e567e99fee23d52ae4e3df2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"MrPeanutsCarrier\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0784M62BC/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B0784M62BC&#38;linkId=a8995d504700af4839ae8474dfe1d52a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Mr. Peanut's Double Expandable Carrier, available at Amazon, $54.99</a></h3><p>A <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-carrier\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">cat carrier</a> is mandatory for bringing your cat home from the shelter, said Franu&#353;ić. We love <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/mr-peanuts-platinum-series-expandable-pet-carrier-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Mr. Peanut's stylish and comfortable tote</a>, which can unzip to expand to almost three times the size of a regular carrier, making it more comfortable for long travel days.&#160;</p>\n\tA calming pheromone diffuser to decrease stress\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5435d7fee23d5f5c58d4c8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"FeliwayClassic\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Ffeliway-plug-in-diffuser-refill%2Fdp%2F121785\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Feliway Classic Diffuser, available at Chewy, $35.99</a></h3><p>To help decrease stress and unwanted behaviors like urine spraying that go with it, both Moore and Carr recommend using a calming pheromone like Feliway during your cat's first weeks in their furever home. Feliway, which <a href=\"https://pets.webmd.com/features/pet-pheromone-products-for-behavior-problems#1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">mimics the F3 facial pheromones</a> cats deposit when rubbing their cheeks against surfaces in order to mark them as safe, can help a cat transition to a new house, according to Moore.</p>\n\tEarthquake putty to keep knickknacks, vases, and picture frames from becoming playthings\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543748fee23d5c61308ea7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"QuakeHold\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Quakehold-88111-Museum-Putty-Neutral/dp/B0002VA9NA/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=earthquake+putty&#38;qid=1582319407&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sr=8-1&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=d56a3ec76961806dda96df4494f84b19&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Quakehold! Museum Putty, available at Amazon, $3.99</a></h3><p>\"When you actually get a cat into your home, you find that they love to explore and get on top of things,\" explained Franu&#353;ić. Adhering your knickknacks to shelves and tables using earthquake putty assures that your favorite picture frame or vase won't end up in pieces on the floor. \"It was a lifesaver for me,\" she said.</p>\n\tA safe place for your kitty to do their business\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5437c3fee23d622852a47a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"JumboCatLitter\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fcatit-jumbo-hooded-cat-pan%2Fdp%2F49789\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Pan, available at Chewy, $29.99</a></h3><p>When it comes to a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-litter-box\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">litter box</a>, all of our experts agree that simple is best. You want a box your cat can use \"without having to do any tricks,\" said Dr. Moore. And even though they are convenient, she recommended avoiding self-cleaning boxes because the noises they make can frighten cats. At HSSV, they recommend just using a simple uncovered litter box, said Farel-Friedman. If you prefer your box to be covered to reduce smells or prevent your dog from getting inside, buy one with a removable lid that can be added later on.&#160;</p>\n\tAn unscented, natural litter to make using the litter box appealing\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543833fee23d62e07a54f7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Okokat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fokocat-super-soft-clumping-wood%2Fdp%2F117426\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">&#214;kocat Natural Wood Clumping Litter, available at Chewy, $19.99</a></h3><p>Moore recommended avoiding dusty litters, which can cause respiratory issues, and perfumy litters with a strong scent. All three of our shelter experts prefer litters made of natural materials like corn or millet. Carr's favorite litters are made from pine wood. \"I think they're really efficient at neutralizing odors and are really easy to scoop,\" she said. For more ideas, check out our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-natural-cat-litter\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best natural cat litter</a>.</p>\n\tA flat, wide food dish to prevent whisker fatigue\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543897fee23d5e7032e816?format=jpeg\" alt=\"CatFoodBowl\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fdr-catsbys-whisker-relief-cat-bowl%2Fdp%2F165467\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Dr. Catsby Cat Food Bowl, available at Chewy, $19.70</a></h3><p>For cats with sensitive whiskers, brushing up against the side of a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-bowl\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">food or water bowl</a> can cause pain and make eating stressful. To prevent \"whisker fatigue,\" Dr. Moore suggested using a flatter dish without steep sides.&#160;</p>\n\tNutritious, scientifically formulated dry and wet food your cat will love to eat\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543943fee23d64f24dad64?format=jpeg\" alt=\"HillsScience\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fhills-science-diet-adult-indoor%2Fdp%2F34081\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Hill's Science Diet Dry Cat Food for Indoor Cats, available at Chewy, $40.99</a></h3><p>While many cats prefer dry foods, they are high in carbohydrates and calories, said Moore. Feeding a diet that includes wet food can help to maintain weight and overall health. \"Wet food is great for cats because it provides more moisture. It's especially important for males because you want them producing urine so they don't have urinary issues,\" she explained.</p><p>Franu&#353;ić and Farel-Friedman recommended Hill's Science Diet, which is scientifically formulated and comes in several varieties for cats with different needs. There are plenty of other <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-food\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">high-quality options</a>, including <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/nomnomnow-fresh-cat-dog-food-review-cost\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">NomNomNow</a>, a human-grade monthly cat food delivery service.&#160;</p>\n\tIrresistible treats for training and high-stress situations\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5439cefee23d6543659ac5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Churu\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Finaba-churu-grain-free-chicken-tuna%2Fdp%2F169591\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Inaba Churu Lickable Puree Natural Cat Treat, available at Chewy, $17.96</a></h3><p>\"We use Churu for clicker training and it works wonders,\" said Carr. <a href=\"https://www.clickertraining.com/node/1776\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Clicker training</a>, a form of positive-reinforcement training that marks correct behaviors with a distinct clicking sound, is an excellent way to teach tricks and address behavior challenges in cats. Churu is great for stressful situations, too. \"We have cats who are super stressed and we give them Churu, and it works so well to distract them from what's going on,\" said Carr. For more ideas, see our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-treats\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best cat treats</a>.</p>\n\tTasty dental treats to help promote a happy, healthy mouth\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543a30fee23d60fd44d763?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Feline\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Feline-Greenies-Dental-Treats-Tempting/dp/B082VSR9PB/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=greenies%2Bcats&#38;qid=1582308022&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sr=1-12&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=b0402a2f3a868c1eb13b8520acdbec28&#38;language=en_US&#38;th=1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Feline Greenies Natural Dental Care Treats, available at Amazon, from $2.34</a></h3><p>Keeping your cat's mouth clean is essential to its overall health. \"Ideally, you should try to teach your cat to have its teeth brushed,\" said Dr. Moore. But if that proves too challenging, dental treats are the next best thing. She also recommended using <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Oxyfresh-Premium-Dental-Care-Solution/dp/B002OXHJ6Y/ref=as_li_ss_tl?crid=1B1OFT0U0AF7L&#38;keywords=healthy+mouth+water+additive+for+cats&#38;qid=1582324052&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sprefix=healthy+mout%252Cpets%252C442&#38;sr=1-4&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=445fddecfd96539624b6efb2545dfd89&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Oxyfresh Healthy Mouth</a> water additive for stress-free dental care. For more options, check out our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-dental-product\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best dental products for cats</a>.</p>\n\tA reflective breakaway collar to hold your cat’s ID tags on outdoor adventures\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543ae6fee23d623566ec45?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Rogz\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/ROGZ-Reflective-Breakaway-Removable-Adjustable/dp/B00J619LZO/ref=as_li_ss_tl?crid=3JWRQWQVKEB2M&#38;keywords=rogz%2Bcat%2Bcollar&#38;qid=1582308328&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sprefix=rogz%252Cpets%252C249&#38;sr=1-8&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=a9846e25da3ec22bf9c729e1d015af4c&#38;language=en_US&#38;th=1&#38;psc=1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">ROGZ Reflective Cat Collar, available at Amazon, $11.95</a></h3><p>If your cat goes outdoors, they need a breakaway collar that will come undone if they get caught on a tree branch or fence, said Moore. We like this durable reflective collar by Rogz, which is the top pick in our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-collar\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best cat collars</a>.</p>\n\tStainless steel ID tags to make sure outdoor kitties get home safely\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543b3afee23d627a0c6d3b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GoTags\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fgotags-personalized-stainless-steel%2Fdp%2F179792\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">GoTags Stainless Steel Pet ID Tags, available at Chewy, $7.95</a></h3><p>Even if your cat is microchipped, ID tags engraved with their name and phone number can help them make it home safe and sound. If your cat is indoor-only, Dr. Moore said they don't need to wear a collar or ID tags. Instead, microchip your cat so that they can be easily identified if they escape.</p>\n\tA comfy harness and leash set for taking your cat on a walk\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543b7cfee23d67ed3dcb13?format=jpeg\" alt=\"CatHarness\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Harness-Leash-Walking-Escape-Inches/dp/B07SC7WFQN/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=cat+harness+leash&#38;qid=1582308560&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sr=1-4&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=1f31a0f90d27463e950e490ca1ac1b2b&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Rabbitgoo Cat Harness and Leash Set, available at Amazon, from $14.84</a></h3><p>For indoor cats, the outdoors is a fantasy world of sights, sounds, and smells that many find delightful. According to Dr. Moore, leash training \"is a safe way to have [a] cat outside and a good activity for the cat and owner to do together.\" But because being on a leash is not a natural behavior for cats, guardians need to take the time to acclimate their cat to the leash.</p>\n\tA brush for removing excess hair and decreasing nasty hairballs\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543c66fee23d6922438fb9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Furminator\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Furminator-Undercoat-deShedding-Tool-Cats/dp/B07MZH7DP5/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=cat+furminator&#38;qid=1582308860&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sr=1-4&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=f0ae41146a282afee0866d93b1672c68&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Furminator for Cats, available at Amazon, from $31.95</a></h3><p>Cats are fastidious, and in the process of grooming, they consume a lot of hair. For long-haired cats, especially, \"brushing is really helpful to remove the loose hair that is ready to shed that may get matted if not removed,\" said Moore. A <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-brush\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">good cat brush</a> like the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-brush-furminator-review-2018-3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Furminator</a> can help remove the excess hair and may reduce the frequency of hairballs.&#160;</p>\n\tA scratching post for your cat to claw\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543cc1fee23d645428daf2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"MaxandMarlow\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Max-Marlow-Tall-Scratch-Post/dp/B00X9GVJHK/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=cat+scratching+post&#38;qid=1582309304&#38;refinements=p_72%253A2661618011&#38;rnid=2661617011&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sr=1-72&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=d4166ce2ed8a17b0c5a47eb8f4b9fddd&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Max &#38; Marlow Tall Scratch Post, available at Amazon, $25.26</a></h3><p>\"Cats scratch as a scent marker, to help with their nails, and to relieve stress,\" said Moore. Plus, your cat will be less likely to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-stop-cat-from-scratching-couch\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">scratch your furniture</a> if they have other options. This cat scratcher from Max &#38; Marlow includes a 26-inch scratching post plus two attached toys. For more ideas, check out our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-scratching-post\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best scratching posts</a>.</p>\n\tA cat wand for chasing, pouncing, and play\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543d1cfee23d69a53f8b86?format=jpeg\" alt=\"DaBird\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.petco.com%2Fshop%2Fen%2Fpetcostore%2Fproduct%2Fda-bird-feather-teaser%3Firgwc%3D1%26irclickid%3DQ-NzNHSXjxyORZN0TbWK8Xs3UkiX21Q0wx2wSM0%26cm_mmc%3DAFF-_-IMP-_-CCY-_-PME-_-PET-_-AQU-_-196318-_-0-_-ONLINE_TRACKING_LINK-_-648966\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">GoCat Da Bird Pull Apart Wand, available at Petco, $8.95</a></h3><p>\"The best toys are the ones where you can interact with your cat. Playing with them helps you to bond better,\" said Farel-Friedman. Cat wands are a classic kitty favorite, and Carr recommended both <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.petco.com%2Fshop%2Fen%2Fpetcostore%2Fproduct%2Fda-bird-feather-teaser%3Firgwc%3D1%26irclickid%3DQ-NzNHSXjxyORZN0TbWK8Xs3UkiX232swx2wSM0%26cm_mmc%3DAFF-_-IMP-_-CCY-_-PME-_-PET-_-AQU-_-196318-_-0-_-ONLINE_TRACKING_LINK-_-648966\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Da Bird</a> and <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Go-Cat-Catcher-Teaser-Mouse/dp/B000LPOUNW/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=go+cat+cat+catcher&#38;qid=1582568222&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sr=1-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Cat Catcher</a> by GoCat. See our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-toy\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best cat toys</a> for more options.</p>\n\tAn interactive food puzzle toy to stimulate your cat’s hunting instincts\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543d57fee23d6a573d1062?format=jpeg\" alt=\"TreatBall\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Catit-51282-Treat-Ball-Blue/dp/B00357M8S2/ref=as_li_ss_tl?crid=3K7YZOE2JKLHW&#38;keywords=cat+food+toys+interactive&#38;qid=1582309832&#38;s=pet-supplies&#38;sprefix=cat+food+toy%252Cpets%252C283&#38;sr=1-25&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipf_022420_cat-products-for-home-20&#38;linkId=3d0d9a8cded5684325ba2b0e8f50a705&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Catit Hagen Treat Ball, available at Amazon, $4.49</a></h3><p>\"I think food puzzle toys are great,\" said Carr. \"They're really good for cats who are overweight and for cats who are overstimulated. It's more natural, too, because [it mimics the way] cats have to work for their food in the wild.\" Moore suggested feeding kibble out of interactive food puzzle toys as well as &#8212; or instead of &#8212; treats.</p>\n\t Regular flea treatment to keep the itches away \n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543df7fee23d6a9606af64?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Seresto\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chewy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l4Nww/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2Fseresto-8-month-flea-tick-prevention%2Fdp%2F46492\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Seresto Flea and Tick Prevention Collar, available at Chewy, $57.98</a></h3><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-flea-prevention-cats\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Flea control</a> is important regardless of whether a cat is indoor-only or goes outside. Most flea treatments are topical, but Seresto also makes a flea collar that many cat owners like. Not all cats will be comfortable wearing a flea collar, but for those that tolerate it, Moore said it's a good option.</p>\n\tA cardboard floor scratcher with tracking balls to promote independent play\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543e38fee23d6af145c2b3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"TurboscratcherCatToy\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bergan</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.petco.com%2Fshop%2Fen%2Fpetcostore%2Fproduct%2Fbergan-star-chaser-turbo-scratcher-cat-toy%3Firgwc%3D1%26irclickid%3DQ-NzNHSXjxyORZN0TbWK8Xs3UkiX23RUwx2wSM0%26cm_mmc%3DAFF-_-IMP-_-CCY-_-PME-_-PET-_-AQU-_-196318-_-0-_-ONLINE_TRACKING_LINK-_-648966\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bergan Turboscratcher Cat Toy, available at Petco, $57.98</a></h3><p>All of our experts agreed that there is no such thing as too many scratchers. Carr likes the Bergan Turboscratcher which has a ball in the frame. \"Cats get their scratch on while playing with the balls inside,\" she said. \"They can play and entertain themselves so even if you're not home they have stimulation.\"</p>\n\tA cat tree tower for climbing, scratching, and play\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e543e48fee23d65d7212c75?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Armarkat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Petco</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.petco.com%2Fshop%2Fen%2Fpetcostore%2Fproduct%2Farmarkat-classic-model-a5201-cat-tree%3Firgwc%3D1%26irclickid%3DQ-NzNHSXjxyORZN0TbWK8Xs3UkiX23TAwx2wSM0%26cm_mmc%3DAFF-_-IMP-_-CCY-_-PME-_-PET-_-AQU-_-196318-_-0-_-ONLINE_TRACKING_LINK-_-648966\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Armarkat Classic Cat Tree, available at Petco, $71.98</a></h3><p>\"We definitely recommend cat trees,\" said Farel-Friedman. \"They not only provide cats with the ability of choice, but they also provide them with exercise and stress relief.\" Dr. Moore agreed: \"You want to have vertical space, especially people who have a small living area.\" The ideal tree has built-in scratching posts and plenty of spots to snuggle up. That's why we like the classic cat tree from Armarkat, which is the budget pick in our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cat-tree\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best cat trees</a>.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/new-cat-supplies'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a 10:29:59","updatedTime":"2020-10-17 10:29:59","title":"Slack says it has resolved issues with its software that caused some users to experience issues","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-slack-down-not-working-outage-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89ae67d260780019341cf6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Slack logo\" height=\"2274\" width=\"3033\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Slack Technologies Inc. logo is seen on a banner outside the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) during thew company&#39;s IPO in New York\n<p class=\"copyright\">Brendan McDermid/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Some Slack users said they experienced issues Friday morning, including trouble sending messages or just generally slow service with the software.</li>\n<li>The company told Business Insider that Slack is now back up and running.</li>\n<li>This is one of several partial or total outages that the company has experienced during the pandemic as people continue to work remotely.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Slack has resolved issues that were affecting its service on Friday, the company told Business Insider. Its <a href=\"https://status.slack.com/\">website</a> now reads \"Slack is up and running.\"&#160;</p><p>Some Slack users said they were experiencing \"degraded performances and connectivity issues\" with the workplace messaging software on Friday morning.</p><p>\"Users may have issues sending messages, APIs or general slowness on Slack,\" the company had earlier posted on its <a href=\"https://status.slack.com/2020-10/3e2253fb0e2f1b7c\">website.</a></p><p>This is one of several partial or total outages that the company has faced during the pandemic as people continue to work remotely and rely heavily on virtual work tools. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/slack-outage-tuesday-remote-work-2020-5\">In mid-May</a>, the service was down for two-and-a-half hours one evening.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/is-slack-down-not-working-outage-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div Canales)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f89ae67d260780019341cf6?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn68@2020_4/2020/10/17/02-30-20-340_a903dfd6d06f6f66.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn67@2020_6/2020/10/17/02-30-26-160_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=jTEjTMGa6IQ:E8seciFxpoI:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/10/17/02-30-17-056_a451b75f3e047082.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=jTEjTMGa6IQ:E8seciFxpoI:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn4@2020_4/2020/10/17/02-30-17-243_4f441430cb65fed6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn51@2020_3/2020/10/17/02-30-21-755_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=jTEjTMGa6IQ:E8seciFxpoI:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn15@2020_3/2020/10/17/02-30-17-643_3104ececad24aa49.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/jTEjTMGa6IQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn43@2020_3/2020/10/17/02-30-23-851_7e948334453fbcba.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602901799679},{"createdTime":"2020-10-17 10:29:59","updatedTime":"2020-10-17 10:29:59","title":"The US federal deficit surges to record $3.1 trillion for 2020 amid unprecedented stimulus spending","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-federal-budget-deficit-record-trillion-coronavirus-stimulus-recession-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89e4a6d260780019341e94?format=jpeg\" alt=\"FILE PHOTO: The U.S. Treasury building is seen in Washington, September 29, 2008. REUTERS/Jim Bourg\" height=\"2096\" width=\"4193\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The US Treasury Building in Washington, DC.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The US federal budget deficit soared to a record $3.1 trillion in the fiscal year that ended in September, according to Treasury Department <a href=\"https://fiscal.treasury.gov/files/reports-statements/mts/mts0920.pdf\">data</a> published Friday.</li>\n<li>The monthly budget report reflects the historic fiscal spending used to pad the US against the coronavirus pandemic, as well as the weakened tax income from Americans struggling through the pandemic.</li>\n<li>Outlays climbed to $6.6 trillion, led mainly by the $2.2 trillion CARES Act passed in March.</li>\n<li>The deficit surpasses the White House's February forecast by more than $2 trillion. It's also roughly three times the deficit seen in fiscal 2019.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The US federal budget deficit spiked to a record $3.1 trillion in the fiscal year that ended in September, according to <a href=\"https://fiscal.treasury.gov/files/reports-statements/mts/mts0920.pdf\">data</a> released Friday by the Treasury Department.</p><p>The monthly budget statement caps a year rife with economic catastrophe and unprecedented relief measures. The coronavirus pandemic first slammed businesses, corporations, and households in February and continues to wreak havoc on US economic growth as case counts swing higher.</p><p>The fallout prompted Congress to allocate several trillion dollars for fiscal support, including the $2.2 trillion CARES Act passed in March. In all, government outlays leaped to $6.6 trillion in 2020 from the $4.4 trillion total seen last year.</p><p>Receipts reached $3.4 trillion, reflecting a drop in tax income from the year-ago period as Americans struggled through the once-in-a-century pandemic.&#160;</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/5-top-emerging-market-stock-picks-outperforming-cio-emqq-etf-2020-10\" data-analytics-position=\"2\" data-analytics-module=\"\">The founder of an ETF trouncing 99% of competitors explains how industry pioneer Burton Malkiel taught him how to invest in emerging markets — and shares 5 stock picks he loves right now</a></em></p><p>\"As the country continues to open up and this Administration pursues its pro-growth agenda, our economy will continue its robust recovery, sending Americans back to work and improving our fiscal picture,\" Russ Vought, the director of the White House Office of Management and Budget, said in a <a href=\"https://home.treasury.gov/news/press-releases/sm1155\">statement</a>.</p><p>Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin added that the CARES Act and other stimulus measures paved the way for \"a strong economic recovery.\"</p><p>The yearly total surpasses the White House's February forecast by more than $2 trillion. It's also roughly three times the deficit seen in fiscal 2019.</p><p>To be sure, the ballooning US debt pile will be relatively easy for the government to pay off in the coming years. The Federal Reserve has indicated it will hold interest rates near zero through at least 2023, ensuring low borrowing costs for the government.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/long-term-stock-picks-recommendations-investing-strategy-parnassus-lori-keith-2020-10\" data-analytics-position=\"12\" data-analytics-module=\"\">Lori Keith's mutual fund has grown 98,000% in 12 years by focusing on unflashy companies. She told us about 7 such stocks that thrived in the recession — and will likely do even better in the recovery.</a></em></p><p>Still, the sum stands to climb as legislators deliberate over a new stimulus package. Democrats and the White House inch closer to compromising on a bill set to cost between $1.8 trillion and $2.2 trillion. Senate Republicans, on the other hand, object to the hefty price tag and hope to pass a $500 billion measure. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell indicated Thursday <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/mcconnell-stimulus-package-coronavirus-relief-compromise-white-house-democrats-2020-10\">he wouldn't even bring a larger deal to a vote</a>.</p><p>Lawmakers have plodded forward in stimulus talks for weeks with little to show for progress. At the same time, economists on Wall Street and elsewhere in the federal government emphasized the importance of new aid as the pace of recovery slows. Fed Chairman Jerome Powell repeatedly praised the CARES Act for its role in sparking a recovery and urged Congress to approve more stimulus.</p><p>Corporate leaders joined the calls over the past week, with several CEOs and other executives calling for new stimulus.</p><p>\"The consumer has been extraordinarily strong through this crisis, and it's not luck, and it's not because they weren't affected. It's because of the CARES Act, specifically the unemployment assistance,\" Wells Fargo CEO Charles Scharf said.</p><p>The bank is seeing signs of Americans' cash balances \"starting to go away\" after stimulus programs expired, he added.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-jim-osman-investing-expert-3-winners-2020-10\" data-analytics-position=\"11\" data-analytics-module=\"\">200-plus money managers pay thousands to see which stocks are on Jim Osman's buy list. He details 2 he sees doubling and says one has at least 50% left to soar.</a></em></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a
